es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.server

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.server.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerWindow.WindowEventListener

    public class GameServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerWindow.WindowEventListener
    A simple multithreaded server. Makes no assumptions regarding data that gets exchanged between servers and clients.

    Un sencillo servidor multihilo. No hace suposiciones respecto a datos que se intercambian entre servidores y clientes.

    Author:
    Raul Murillo and Antonio Valdivia

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameServer

        public GameServer(int port,
                  int timeout,
                  GameFactory gameFactory,
                  java.util.List<Piece> pieces)
        Full constructor of the class.

        Constructor completo de la clase.

        Parameters:
        port - Port on which the server must be started.

        Puerto sobre el que debe iniciarse el servidor.

        timeout - Timeout, in milliseconds, of the server.

        Tiempo límite, en milisegundos, del servidor.

        gameFactory - Factory of the game.

        Factoria del juego.

        pieces - Pieces of the current game.

        Piezas del juego actual.

        public Piece getLocalPiece()
